efforts.name: Infrastructure Planning
efforts.description: Plan and set up infrastructure to support your team's AI initiatives

tasks.title: ⭐ Evaluate current infrastructure
tasks.description: Review existing hardware and cloud resources. Identify what's working well and what needs improvement or replacement.

tasks.title: Determine team requirements
tasks.description: Calculate resource needs based on team size and planned usage. Consider current needs and growth projections.

tasks.title: Choose deployment strategy
tasks.description: Decide between cloud, on-premise, or hybrid. Consider cost, security, scalability, and operational complexity.

tasks.title: Plan resource allocation
tasks.description: Allocate resources across team members and projects. Set up resource limits and monitoring to prevent overuse.

tasks.title: Estimate costs
tasks.description: Calculate infrastructure costs for different scenarios. Compare options and plan budget accordingly.

tasks.title: Create infrastructure roadmap
tasks.description: Plan infrastructure evolution over time. Identify when upgrades or changes will be needed.

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up shared resources
tasks.description: Configure shared storage, databases, and compute resources for the team. Ensure proper access controls.

tasks.title: Implement access controls
tasks.description: Set up authentication and authorization. Define who can access what resources and ensure security.

tasks.title: Configure monitoring
tasks.description: Set up logging and monitoring tools. Track usage, performance, and costs to stay informed.

tasks.title: Set up backup systems
tasks.description: Configure automated backups for critical data. Test restore procedures to ensure backups work.

tasks.title: Document infrastructure
tasks.description: Create documentation for your infrastructure setup and procedures. Keep it updated as things change.

tasks.title: Train team on infrastructure
tasks.description: Educate team on how to use infrastructure resources. Provide guides and support for common tasks.

tasks.title: ⭐ Assess security requirements
tasks.description: Identify security requirements for your infrastructure. Consider data sensitivity, compliance needs, and risk tolerance.

tasks.title: Configure security settings
tasks.description: Set up security configurations: firewalls, access controls, encryption, and security monitoring.

tasks.title: Implement password policies
tasks.description: Establish strong password policies. Require complex passwords and regular changes.

tasks.title: Set up security monitoring
tasks.description: Configure monitoring for security events. Set up alerts for suspicious activity or unauthorized access.

tasks.title: Create security documentation
tasks.description: Document security policies and procedures. Include incident response plans and security best practices.

tasks.title: Schedule security reviews
tasks.description: Plan regular security reviews. Assess vulnerabilities and update security measures as needed.

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify compliance requirements
tasks.description: Determine what regulations apply to your infrastructure. Consider data protection, industry-specific rules, and regional requirements.

tasks.title: Assess compliance gaps
tasks.description: Evaluate current infrastructure against compliance requirements. Identify gaps and needed improvements.

tasks.title: Implement compliance controls
tasks.description: Put controls in place to meet compliance requirements. Document how controls address each requirement.

tasks.title: Set up audit logging
tasks.description: Enable comprehensive audit logging. Track access, changes, and activities for compliance reporting.

tasks.title: Create compliance documentation
tasks.description: Document compliance approach and evidence. Prepare materials for audits and reviews.

tasks.title: Plan compliance monitoring
tasks.description: Establish process for ongoing compliance monitoring. Schedule regular reviews and updates.

tasks.title: ⭐ Analyze current costs
tasks.description: Review current infrastructure spending. Break down costs by service, project, and team member.

tasks.title: Identify cost savings
tasks.description: Find opportunities to reduce costs. Look for unused resources, over-provisioned services, and better pricing options.

tasks.title: Right-size resources
tasks.description: Match resource allocation to actual needs. Remove unused resources and optimize resource sizes.

tasks.title: Set up cost alerts
tasks.description: Configure alerts for cost thresholds. Get notified when spending exceeds budgets or increases unexpectedly.

tasks.title: Create cost reports
tasks.description: Generate regular cost reports. Track spending trends and share with stakeholders.

tasks.title: Establish cost policies
tasks.description: Create policies for infrastructure spending. Set approval processes and spending limits.
